info.title: myapp
info.description:
![alt-text](https://cuit.columbia.edu/sites/default/files/logo/CUIT_Logo_286_web.jpg "CUIT logo")


A sample API that uses courses as an example to demonstrate representing
[JSON:API 1.0](http://jsonapi.org/format) in the OpenAPI 3.0 specification.


See [https://columbia-it-django-jsonapi-training.readthedocs.io](https://columbia-it-django-jsonapi-training.readthedocs.io)
for more about this.


(c) 2018-2020 The Trustees of Columbia University in the City of New York

get.description: A course of instruction. e.g. COMSW1002 Computing in Context

parameters.name: page[number]
parameters.description: A page number within the paginated result set.

parameters.name: page[size]
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Which field to use when ordering the results.

links.description: Link members related to primary data

post.description: A course of instruction. e.g. COMSW1002 Computing in Context

effective_start_date.description: date when this instance becomes valid

effective_end_date.description: date when this instance becomes invalid

201.description: [Created](https://jsonapi.org/format/#crud-creating-responses-201). Assigned `id` and/or any other changes are in this response.

links.description: Link members related to primary data

204.description: [Created](https://jsonapi.org/format/#crud-creating-responses-204) with the supplied `id`. No other changes from what was POSTed.

Link members related to primary data

oneOf.description: a string containing the link's URL

href.description: a string containing the link's URL

relationshipToOne.description: reference to other resource in a to-one relationship

relationshipLinks.description: optional references to other resource objects

relationshipToMany.description: An array of objects each containing the 'type' and 'id' for to-many relationships

pointer.description: A [JSON Pointer](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6901) to the associated entity in the request document [e.g. `/data` for a primary data object, or `/data/attributes/title` for a specific attribute.

parameter.description: A string indicating which query parameter caused the error.

type.description: The [type](https://jsonapi.org/format/#document-resource-object-identification) member is used to describe resource objects that share common attributes and relationships.

id.description: Each resource object’s type and id pair MUST [identify](https://jsonapi.org/format/#document-resource-object-identification) a single, unique resource.

scopes.demo-django-jsonapi-training-sla-bronze: permitted to access the django-jsonapi-training demo: 1 request per second
scopes.demo-django-jsonapi-training-sla-update: permitted to update the django-jsonapi-training resources
